author: Alejandro Sayavera Solis
post_text: October 26, 2016 at 6:28 PM#1Hi guys im working in a macro who generate a executor with 3 cues, i need writte a line in my macro that generate in the cmd of my cue 3 this order "off executor" somebody have any idea how can i make it ? thanks to everyone

posts.author: Alejandro Sayavera Solis
posts.post_text: October 26, 2016 at 6:28 PM#1Hi guys im working in a macro who generate a executor with 3 cues, i need writte a line in my macro that generate in the cmd of my cue 3 this order "off executor" somebody have any idea how can i make it ? thanks to everyone

posts.author: Alejandro Sayavera Solis
posts.post_text: October 26, 2016 at 6:47 PM#2Sorry i found the answe some post later, the answer is not

posts.author: Duplicate dherderich
posts.post_text: October 27, 2016 at 7:25 AM#3Cue-Mode Release will switch off the executor, when all times(delay, fade, etc.) of the cue are finished.No need to add a command to for especially turning it off.

posts.author: Alejandro Sayavera Solis
posts.post_text: November 16, 2016 at 7:52 PM#4thanks for your answer

posts.author: Duplicate bentoylight
posts.post_text: November 18, 2016 at 4:53 PM#5assign exec 101 cue 3 /cmd="off exec 101"

title: macro that include a command in cmd line of a cue
